name: Coloring Bundle for Kids Free: Educational learning app with beautiful pages of Monsters, Pirates, Birthday and Fruits
name_original: Coloring Bundle for Kids Free: Educational learning app with beautiful pages of Monsters, Pirates, Birthday and Fruits
description:
Explore the child's artistic ability with "Coloring Bundle for Kids". Beautifully designed Coloring app packed with 36 beautiful pages of Birthday, Fruits, Monsters and Pirates. A guaranteed fun of long hours for your kid. It has Child friendly interface with a soothing music.

Universal app/game works perfectly on all Apple devices.

What's Inside:

- Child-friendly interface.
- Child Safe and easy to use controls
- 4 coloring pages categories:

- 9 Pages of birthday celebrations
- 9 Pages of yummy fruits
- 9 Pages of lovely and cuddly monsters
- 9 Pages of Sea pirates' adventure

- Child can save their lovely creations by the saving the images to Artwork Folder which can be accessed later on for further coloring.
- Three brush sizes for Painting and Erasing.
- 17 different colors to paint.
- Share your Masterpiece through Email, Save to device Album, Facebook, Twitter or take a print and stick on your wall.
- Designed and tested with parents and children of various ages.
- Full high resolution Retina Display graphics.
- Clear and pleasant sounds.
- Enjoy and Have fun

Share your feedback with us. It will help us make better games/apps for Kids.
